summary: The module implements a strategy for associating Node.js configuration files with appropriate parsers and provides utilities to extract module alias definitions from various JavaScript/Node.js configuration formats (e.g., package.json, Babel, Rollup, Snowpack, tsconfig, Vite, Webpack). This enables accurate alias resolution during reachability analysis in software composition security scans.
business_intent: Facilitate security and compliance scanning of Node.js projects by correctly interpreting module alias configurations, thereby improving detection of vulnerable or misused dependencies across the codebase.
